subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: The API example demonstrates the use of the SchemaCrawler API to create a data source, and obtain database metadata. The SchemaCrawler API is a much simpler alternative to using JDBC metadata.

ol.li:
Copy the SchemaCrawler jar file into the
api example directory.
Start the hsqldb server by running runServer.cmd ( runServer.sh on Unix) from the dbserver directory.
Make sure that java and javac are on your PATH.
Run api.cmd ( api.sh on Unix) to compile and run the program.
Try modifying the schemacrawler.config.properties with regular expressions, logging, and so on.
Try uncommenting the code block in ApiExample.java that modifies the default options .
